text: Hans Carl Gustav Wahlgren (26 June 1937 - 10 May 2024) was a Swedish actor. He starred in the Swedish reality show Wahlgrens värld which was broadcast on Kanal 5. He voiced Charles Ingvar "Sickan" Jönssons in the computer games Jönssonligan: Jakten på Mjölner and Jönssonligan går på djupet. Wahlgren was born in Helsingborg, Sweden. He was raised in Gothenburg. In 1962, he married actress Christina Schollin. They had four children; including singer Pernilla. Wahlgren died on 10 May 2024 in Norra Lagnö, Sweden from a short-illness at the age of 86. ==References== Category:2024 deaths Category:1937 births Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Swedish stage actors Category:Swedish voice actors Category:Actors from Gothenburg
title: Hans Wahlgren
